name: Gulag
uniques: Gain control over [all] tiles in a [1]-tile radius
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Gulag] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [City] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Farm] tiles>
Can be built just outside your borders
